subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: When Bob Knight, a Hall of Fame coach, gets victory No. 900, he will join the former Texas coach Jody Conradt and Tennessee’s Pat Summitt as the only members of the N.C.A.A. Division I club.
snippet: When Bob Knight, a Hall of Fame coach, gets victory No. 900, he will join the former Texas coach Jody Conradt and Tennessee’s Pat Summitt as the only members of the N.C.A.A. Division I club.
